headline: 3 Consumer Stocks with Bad Fundamentals
summary: Most consumer discretionary businesses succeed or fail based on the broader economy. This sensitive demand profile can cause discretionary stocks to plummet when macro uncertainty enters the fray, and over the past six months, the industry has shed 10.7%. This drop was worse than the S&P 500’s 5.2% fall.
